reviews.text:
A calm and meditative atmosphere is present in this temple. On a weekday afternoon, there was no one here.

The main temple complex is a beautiful and majestic structure.

A statue of Sri Ramakrishna Paramahamsa is present on the first floor. Ground floor has photos of Swami Vivekananda and Sarada Devi.

The temple opens its doors at the break of dawn, welcoming early risers with the melodious chants of Mangala Arati at 6 am. From then until midday, the temple remains accessible, offering a sanctuary for those seeking quiet reflection and meditation. In the evening, as the sun begins its descent, the temple reopens from 4 pm to 8:30 pm, providing another opportunity for visitors to immerse themselves in its tranquil ambiance. Each day, at 7 pm, the ethereal Sandhya Arati ceremony graces the temple, a time when the atmosphere is imbued with a sense of sacredness and reverence.

Nestled beneath the temple's serene halls lies a hidden gem â€“ a book stall brimming with the wisdom of Ramakrishna Vivekananda Vedanta. Here, visitors can explore a treasure trove of spiritual literature, enriching their minds and souls with the teachings of these revered masters.

Ramakrishna Mission Singapore is more than just a place of worship; it is a sanctuary for the soul, a haven where one can seek refuge from the chaos of the outside world and find inner peace. Whether you are a devout follower or a curious seeker, this is undoubtedly a must-visit destination for anyone in search of tranquility and spiritual enrichment in the heart of Singapore.
Peaceful and so nice to listen to the monks chant the evening prayers. This Is a very lovely place to visit and see the good work they are doing for society
You find peace here. Timings are pretty strict in all the Ramakrishna Missions world wide, so be there on time if you wish to see Ramakrishna Paramahansa

Ramakrishna Mission...an organisation with Values and Discipline.
A must visit place for  everyone .
One can learn many things like YOGA,Sanskrit,Slokas ,Bala kendram for kids,kids play area,football ground.
Services like Free homeo clinic and many more programs.

Ever since from my childhood ,im more influenced by Vivekannanda and his teachings.
I do remember Swamy Vivekanda sayings
"Dont be afraid ,You can do."
"You are the creator of your destiny".
" Education is for Character Building"
many more.
I always believe we must share the values to the next generation,it will be asset to them.
as we got from Vivekananda.

As on 20th April 2019 there is 125 birthday celebrations of  Swamy VIVEKANANDA.
Now organising at PGP Hall ,at perumal temple,Invitations are available at  R.K.Matt.
